AK::IAkPluginParam

~IAkPluginParam
virtual AKRESULT AK::IAkPluginParam::SetParam ( AkPluginParamID  in_paramID,
const void *  in_pValue,
AkUInt32  in_uParamSize 
) [pure virtual]

Update a single parameter at a time and perform the necessary actions on the parameter changes.

Note: The parameter ID corresponds to the AudioEnginePropertyID in the plug-in XML description file.
Returns:
AK_Success if successful, AK_InvalidParameter otherwise
See also:
  • iakeffectparam_setparam
Parameters:
in_paramID ID number of the parameter to set
in_pValue Pointer to the value of the parameter to set
in_uParamSize Size of the value of the parameter to set

Implements AK::IAkRTPCSubscriber.
